<defines>
GHASH_CLMUL_CPU -> 20201002
</defines>

<module_info>
name -> "GHASH SIMD"
brief -> "GHASH using SIMD instructions"
</module_info>

endian little

<requires>
simd
</requires>

<isa>
x86_32:sse2
x86_32:ssse3
x86_32:aesni

x86_64:ssse3
x86_64:aesni
arm64:neon
arm64:armv8crypto
ppc64:powercrypto
ppc64:vsx
</isa>

<arch>
x86_32

ppc64
</arch>
